meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with the comeliest flowers.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the comeliest girl in the village.
meanings.sent3: The comeliest puppy in the litter wagged its tail happily.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the comeliest melody he had ever heard.
meanings.sent5: The comeliest sunset painted the sky in shades of pink and gold.
